oracle.spatial.spark.vector.streaming.dstream

Class SpatialJavaPairDStream<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • oracle.spatial.spark.vector.streaming.dstream.SpatialJavaPairDStream<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -

    public class SpatialJavaPairDStream<K,V>
extends <any>

    This class represents a spatially enabled DStream. A SpatialJavaPairDStream encapsulates an existing JavaPairDStream and adds spatial transformations and functions.

    Spatial information is extracted from the source DStream using an implementation of SparkRecordInfoProvider provided by the user just like it is done with SpatialJavaRDD. The SparkRecordInfoProvider is expected to return the geometry of spatial records.

    Author:
    hsaucedo

        public SpatialTransformationContext<<any>> createSpatialTransformationContext(SpatialOperationConfig spatialOperationConf)
        Creates an instance of SpatialTransformationContext associated to the given SpatialOperationConfig.
        Parameters:
        spatialOperationConf - a spatial operation used to filter records

      • enrich

        public <R> <any> enrich(<any> f,
                        GeoEnricher enricher)
        Associates records from the current spatial DStream to spatial features using an instance of GeoEnricher
        Parameters:
        f - a lambda function which is called for each record from the spatial DStream and its associated spatial features if any.
        enricher - a component used to associate a geometry to spatial features from different spatial data layers
        Returns:
        a new DStream containing data returned by the provided lambda function

      • filter

        public SpatialJavaPairDStream<K,V> filter(<any> f,
                                          SpatialOperationConfig spatialOpConf)
        Performs a filter transformation. Automatically filters records that match the given spatial criteria defined by an instance of SpatialOperationConfig.
        Parameters:
        f - lambda function to further filtering records
        spatialOpConf - spatial criteria used for spatial filtering
        Returns:
        a filtered spatial DStream

      • flatMap

        public <U> <any> flatMap(<any> fmFun,
                         SpatialOperationConfig spatialOpConf)
        Returns a new DStream by first spatially filtering the stream elements using the spatial operation given by spatialOpConf, then a flattening function is applied to all the remaining elements.
        Parameters:
        m - a function to apply to each element
        spatialOpConf - a spatial operation used to filter records
        Returns:
        a new DStream

                                                                    SparkRecordInfoProvider<<any>> recordInfoProvider,
                                                                    java.lang.Class<K> keyType,
                                                                    java.lang.Class<V> valType)
        Creates a new spatial pair DStream from an existing JavaPairDStream
        Parameters:
        stream - the source stream
        recordInfoProvider - an instance of SparkRecordInfoProvider used to extract spatial information from the stream's keys and values
        keyType - the type of the source stream keys
        valType - the type of the source stream values

      • nearestNeighbors

        public <any> nearestNeighbors(<any> f,
                              int k,
                              SpatialOperationConfig spatialOpConf)
        Returns a DStream containing one single element with the k elements which are closest to the given query window
        Parameters:
        qryWindow - a geometry from where the nearest neighbors will be calculated
        k - the number of neighbors
        tol - the tolerance used
        Returns:
        a DStream containing one list with the k nearest neighbors sorted by distance
